00020 #ifndef RDK2_GEOMETRY_OTHERPOINTS
00021 #define RDK2_GEOMETRY_OTHERPOINTS
00022 
00023 #include <vector>
00024 #include <rdkcore/geometry/viewport.h>
00025 #include "point.h"
00026 
00027 // AC: altre strutture point-like in attesa forse di un po' di standardizzazione
00028 //     e di documentazione.
00029 
00030 namespace RDK2 { namespace Geometry {
00031 
00032 struct PolarPoint {
00033     double theta, rho;
00034 
00035     PolarPoint(double theta=0, double rho=0) : theta(theta), rho(rho) {}
00036     PolarPoint(const Point2d&p) {
00037         theta = p.theta();
00038         rho   = p.abs();
00039     }
00040 
00041     Point2d getCartesian() const {
00042         return Point2d::vers(theta) * rho;
00043     }
00044 
00045     bool operator < (const PolarPoint&m) const {
00046         return theta < m.theta;
00047     }
00048 
00049     PolarPoint operator+ (const PolarPoint&  p) const
00050     {
00051         double x = rho*cos(theta) + p.rho*cos(p.theta);
00052         double y = rho*sin(theta) + p.rho*sin(p.theta);
00053 
00054         if(x==0 && y==0)
00055         {
00056             return PolarPoint(0,0);
00057         }
00058         else
00059         {
00060             return PolarPoint( atan2(y,x), sqrt(x*x+y*y));
00061         }
00062     }
00063 
00064     PolarPoint operator- (const PolarPoint&  p) const
00065     {
00066         PolarPoint np(p);
00067         np.theta -= M_PI;
00068         return *this + np;
00069     }
00070 
00071     bool operator== (const PolarPoint& p)
00072     {
00073         return theta == p.theta
00074                         && rho == p.rho;
00075     }
00076 
00077 };
00078 
00079     typedef std::vector<PolarPoint> PPVec;
00080     typedef std::vector<Point2od> OPVec;
00081 
00082     struct AppliedVector {
00083         Point2d where;
00084         double theta;
00085         double weight;
00086 
00087         double theta2;
00088     };
00089 
00090     typedef std::vector<AppliedVector> AVV;
00091 
00093     AVV filterMin(const AVV&v, double min);
00094 
00096     AVV filterMax(const AVV&, double max);
00097     double getMaxRho(const AVV&v);
00098 
00099     Viewport getBounds(AVV&v);
00100 
00101     Point2d min(AVV&v);
00102     Point2d max(AVV&v);
00103 
00104 
00105 }} // end namespaces

00107 #endif
